elyxmFlow.title: Introducing Elyxm _Flow_ :
elyxmFlow.subtitle: Redefining the Event Experience
elyxmFlow.discription: Imagine your event transformed by precision mixology that brings every cocktail to life in real time. Whether you're organizing a concert, festival, conference, or high-profile gathering, enjoy an immersive celebration where each drink elevates your experience and creates unforgettable moments.

features.title: Elyxm at Work
features.subtitle: No more settling for basic, ‘quick to pour’ drinks. With Elyxm, transform your event into an immersive cocktail experience—where masterfully crafted drinks are delivered right where your guests gather, elevating every moment into a celebration they won't forget.
features.carddiscription1: Serve massive crowds quickly without sacrificing quality. Our tech-driven approach ensures consistently perfect pours, even at the largest venues.
features.carddiscription2: Curate an unforgettable beverage experience that matches the elegance and exclusivity of your event. Every detail, from flavor profiles to presentation, is meticulously crafted.
features.carddiscription3: Showcase your portfolio at premier events. With Elyxm, each pour reflects your brand’s identity, guaranteeing a consistent, high-impact impression on attendees.
features.carddiscription4: Elevate networking sessions and after-hours mixers with precision-crafted cocktails that leave a lasting impression—perfect for boosting engagement and brand reputation.

stackedCards.title: Real-Time Control, Right at Your Fingertips
stackedCards.subtitle: Monitor your cocktail service from any device.
stackedCards.carddiscription1: Track pours, monitor inventory, and oversee performance with up-to-the-second data.
stackedCards.note: *Ask us how Elyxm can connect with your current systems—be it your POS, mobile app, or website—so you can manage events without missing a beat.
stackedCards.carddiscription2: Seamlessly syncs with our on-site systems to keep service consistent and efficient.

meetOurCus.title: Meet Our Pioneer Clients
meetOurCus.challenge1: Their in-house mixology needed a way to experiment with innovative cocktail recipes tailored to a dynamic menu, all without sacrificing quality or consistency when the mixologist wasn't on-site.
meetOurCus.solution1: By combining our advanced dispensing technology with a robust recipe library, Gastro Market can effortlessly introduce new, on-trend cocktails at scale—ensuring every drink meets the same high standard, even in the mixologist’s absence.
meetOurCus.challenge2: Delivering a high-end, tailored bar experience during in-house concerts, with beverages crafted for each artist and audience.
meetOurCus.solution2: We collaborate on event-specific menus, leveraging Elyxm’s precision to serve customized drinks that reflect the concert’s vibe, ensuring every guest feels part of the show.
meetOurCus.challenge3: Creating a distinct, on-brand beverage experience that complements unique jewelry collections.
meetOurCus.solution3: Elyxm’s customizable recipes allow Monica Varela to pair exclusive cocktails with her designs—enhancing store events through taste and visual synergy.
meetOurCus.challenge4: Offering quality cocktails in a loud, club-like atmosphere that previously limited drink options.
meetOurCus.solution4: Our streamlined system operates quickly and efficiently, enabling El Cielo to expand its menu from basic offerings to a full cocktail range—without increasing complexity or wait times.

invest.heading: Invest in Elyxm
invest.paragraph_1: Elyxm is revolutionizing the cocktail experience by seamlessly merging the art of mixology with cutting-edge precision technology. Our innovative system delivers cocktails with 1/16th-of-an-ounce accuracy and 5-second pour times, drawing from a curated library of over 250 recipes sourced from mixologists around the globe.
invest.paragraph_2: Designed to transform events—from large-scale festivals and concerts to high-end weddings and corporate gatherings—Elyxm ensures every drink is consistently crafted to perfection. Our platform not only enhances guest experiences but also streamlines operations, reducing labor costs and minimizing waste through real-time data and machine learning insights.
invest.heading_list_1: We have a three-part growth plan to build an extraordinary company:

item_1.title: Scale Our Flagship Smart Bar System:
item_1.description: Expand our market presence in the rapidly growing mixology sector by leveraging advanced technology, data-driven insights, and our unique “Mixology Mode” that empowers bartenders and enthusiasts to create truly personalized cocktails (​​).

item_2.description: Enhance our offering through a subscription-based software platform that delivers curated content, loyalty benefits, and real-time mixology insights—driving consistent, scalable recurring revenue (​​).

item_3.title: Broaden Our Market Reach:
item_3.description: Introduce more accessible product variations to scale our customer base across diverse event settings, ensuring our innovative approach touches new audiences and solidifies our recurring revenue streams.

invest.paragraph_3: Since our 2024 launch, we have celebrated significant milestones—from high-profile events in Santo Domingo and key partnerships with premier venues to early wins that underscore our unwavering commitment to precision, innovation, and the art of mixology. With a seasoned team of mixologists, technologists, and industry veterans, Elyxm is uniquely positioned to set a new standard in the global events market by delivering unparalleled cocktail experiences that captivate and inspire.

faq_1.question: How precise is the cocktail dispensing?

answer.paragraph_1: Elyxm pours cocktails with 1/16th-of-an-ounce accuracy, guaranteeing consistent quality for every drink.

faq_2.question: How fast can each cocktail be served?

answer.paragraph_1: Each pour takes just 5 seconds, the bartender focuses on the shake/stir and garnishing.

faq_3.question: Does Elyxm replace the need for a bartender?

answer.paragraph_1: While Elyxm handles precision pouring and speeds up service, you may want a few staff members to manage other beverages (wine, champagne, non-alcoholic drinks) and assist guests with questions or special requests.

faq_4.question: Can I customize the cocktail menu for my wedding theme?

answer.paragraph_1: Absolutely. Select from over 250 recipes or collaborate with our team to create signature cocktails that match your style and theme.

faq_5.question: Are mocktails or non-alcoholic options available?

answer.paragraph_1: Yes. We offer a range of mocktail recipes that deliver the same elevated experience without the alcohol.

faq_6.question: How do we ensure there’s enough inventory for all our guests?

answer.paragraph_1: The Elyxm system tracks real-time inventory, so you’ll know exactly when to restock. Our team can also help estimate quantities based on your guest count.

faq_7.question: Can the bar area be branded or decorated?

answer.paragraph_1: Definitely. You can incorporate floral arrangements, signage, or custom décor around the Elyxm station to match your wedding aesthetic.

faq_8.question: What can we customize and/or personalize?

answer.paragraph_1: Our support team is on standby by phone or via the online portal. We also provide simple troubleshooting steps in the user manual for quick fixes.

faq_9.question: Is there an additional cost for custom recipes?

answer.paragraph_1: Customization typically falls under our standard service, but any specialized ingredients may incur additional costs. We’ll clarify all details during the planning phase.
